//NamVet Response Rule File
//For L4D2 by New Day & Morning Nine Nine


//Auto-generated blank response for padding out InfoRemarkables
Response _PlayerInfoRemarkableBlankNamVet {
	speak "NamVet_Blank" noscene //Blank
}

Response C7M1SafeRoomIdleNamVet {
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO01.vcd" then Biker C7M1_saferoom01 foo:0 .1 //End of the line, people!

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO07.vcd" then Biker C7M1_saferoom04 foo:0 .1 //Alright, everybody, remember: we're lookin' for a sail boat.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO10.vcd" //Alright, everybody, remember: we're lookin' for a sail boat. I aim to get to the Keys, and I ain't stoppin' for gas.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO11.vcd" then Biker C7M1_saferoom06 foo:0 .1 //We gotta find a sail boat.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO22.vcd" then TeenGirl C7M1_saferoom10a foo:0 .1 //Zoey. You ready to head for the Keys?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO25.vcd" then TeenGirl C7M1_saferoom10a foo:0 .1 //Zoey. You ready to head to the Keys?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO26.vcd" then TeenGirl C7M1_saferoom11 foo:0 .1 //Zoey. You still mad?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO33.vcd" then Biker C7M1_saferoom16 foo:0 .1 //End of the line. Let's move.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO36.vcd" then Biker C7M1_saferoom17 foo:0 .1 //Almost there, people! We just gotta find a boat and we'll be in the Keys.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO37.vcd" then TeenGirl C7M1_saferoom18 foo:0 .1 //That's as far as the train's taking us. If we're gonna get to the Keys, we'll need a boat.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO40.vcd" then Any C7M1_saferoom21 foo:0 .1 //Let's find a boat that can make it to the Gulf.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO43.vcd" then TeenGirl C7M1_saferoom23 foo:0 .1 //End of the line sweeties. Grab some gear and let's go.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3INTRO46.vcd" then Manager C7M1_saferoom25 foo:0 .1 //The train rides over, time to get back to walking.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/c6dlc3communitylines01.vcd" then Manager GonnaWarmUp foo:0 0.01 //Goddamn cold.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/c6dlc3communitylines03.vcd" then Manager GonnaWarmUp foo:0 0.01 //Goddamn it's cold.
}
Rule C7M1SafeRoomIdleNamVet {
	criteria ConceptC7M1SafeRoom2 IsNamVet AutoIsNotScavenge AutoIsNotSurvival _auto_NotC7M1SafeRoomConvo IsNotSpeakingWeight0
	ApplyContext "Talk:1:27,_auto_C7M1SafeRoomConvo:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld

}

Response C7M3BridgeBreaksNamVet {
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS01.vcd" //Goddamn it, the bridge stopped!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS02.vcd" //Son of a bitch, that generator stalled!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS03.vcd" //Generator's stopped! Someone's gotta go down there!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS04.vcd" //Someone needs to restart the generator!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS05.vcd" //Jesus H Christ, the bridge stopped!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS06.vcd" //We ain't safe here! We gotta restart that generator!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS07.vcd" //That gennie's stopped! Someone get down there!
}
Rule C7M3BridgeBreaksNamVet {
	criteria conceptC7M3BridgeBreaks IsNamVet _auto_NotSaidC7M3BridgeBreaks IsWithThree
	ApplyContext "_auto_SaidC7M3BridgeBreaks:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3BridgeBreaksNamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGESTOPS02.vcd" //Son of a bitch, that generator stalled!

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3PRESTART1STGEN04.vcd" //These generators must be setup to power the bridge.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3PRESTART1STGEN05.vcd" //First one, everyone ready?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3PRESTART1STGEN06.vcd" //Get ready, this things gonna make a racket.

Response C7M3PlayerGetToRescueVehicleNamVet {
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGEAVAILABLE01.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //We can get on the bridge!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGEAVAILABLE02.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //Get to the bridge!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGEAVAILABLE03.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //Run to the bridge!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGEAVAILABLE04.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //We gotta raise the bridge!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGEAVAILABLE05.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //To the bridge! The bridge!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3BRIDGEAVAILABLE06.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //Stop playing around and get to the bridge.
}
Rule C7M3PlayerGetToRescueVehicleNamVet {
	criteria ConceptGetToVehicle IsNamVet ismapc7m3_port IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet _auto_NotC7M3ToBridgeNamVet
	ApplyContext "_auto_C7M3ToBridgeNamVet:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response C7M3PlayerGetToRescueVehicleNamVet
}

criterion "HitThatButton" "Concept" "HitThatButton" required
Response HitThatButtonNamVet {
norepeat
	scene "scenes/NamVet/c6dlc3hittingbridgebutton01.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //We gotta hit the the button to raise the bridge.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/c6dlc3hittingbridgebutton02.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //Raise the bridge! Hit the button!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/c6dlc3hittingbridgebutton03.vcd" then self HitThatButton foo:0 10.0 //We gotta all get on and hit that button.
}
Rule HitThatButtonNamVet {
	criteria HitThatButton IsNotSpeaking IsNamVet ChanceToFire50Percent
	Response HitThatButtonNamVet
}

	Response PlayerRemarkc7m2_throughhereNamVet
}

Response PlayerRemarkc7m3_seesailboatNamVet {
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3SPOTTINGSAILBOAT01.vcd" //Christ, bridge is in the way. We'll need to raise it.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3SPOTTINGSAILBOAT02.vcd" //If we wanna take that boat down river, we'll need to raise that bridge.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3SPOTTINGSAILBOAT03.vcd" //There's a sailboat by the bridge! We can take that.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3SPOTTINGSAILBOAT04.vcd" //There's a sailboat on the wrong side of the bridge. We can raise the bridge and go!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3SPOTTINGSAILBOAT05.vcd" //If we raise that bridge, we can use that sailboat.
}

	criteria ConceptRemark IsNamVet Isc7m3_seesailboat IsNotSaidc7m3_seesailboat IsNotCoughing NotInCombat IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsWorldTalkNamVet IsFirstGenerator IsNotSpeakingWeight0 IsNotAlone
	ApplyContext "Saidc7m3_seesailboat:1:0"
	applycontexttoworld

	scene "scenes/NamVet/ReactionNegative10.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Dammit
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears04.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Bull-frickin-horseshit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears09.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //God DAMMIT.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears10.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //Mother of mercy.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/Swears19.vcd" predelay "1,1.5" //What a crock a' shit..

	scene "scenes/NamVet/MoveOn08.vcd" //Alright, let's go.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/MoveOn10.vcd" //Come on, let's go.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/MoveOn12.vcd" //Let's go, people!
}

	applycontexttoworld

}

}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE01.vcd" //Stay there, I got it.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE02.vcd" //Don't get off the bridge, I have this.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE03.vcd" //Stay there! I got this!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE04.vcd" //You take care.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE05.vcd" //Remember: Stay together! No matter what!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE06.vcd" //Do not follow me!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE07.vcd" //Nobody try to help me! I'm doing this alone!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE08.vcd" //I'm not horseshittin' around, don't follow me!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE09.vcd" //Take care of each other!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE10.vcd" //Be safe! Get to the Keys!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE11.vcd" //You guys mean everything to me! Stay there!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE12.vcd" //You guys are the only family I got! Take care of each other!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE13.vcd" //Stay on the goddamn bridge, I have this.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3JUMPINGOFFBRIDGE14.vcd" //No matter what happens: stay together.
}

	criteria ConceptC7M3BridgeLeapSpeakNamVet IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet IsNotSpeaking ismapc7m3_port IsWorldTalkNamVet IsNotScavenge _auto_NotSaidC7M3BridgeLeap IsWithThree

	applycontexttoworld

}

Response PlayerIncapC7m3NamVet {
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE01.vcd" //My job's done. Have at me you bastards!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE02.vcd" //My job's done. Let's see what you got, you big dumb sons of bitches.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE03.vcd" //My friends are safe, there's nothing you bastards can do to me now!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE04.vcd" //You monkeys ain't gonna spoil this.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE05.vcd" //You shoulda brought more tanks with you.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE06.vcd" //You're too late. They're safe.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE07.vcd" //You sons of bitches took everything. But you ain't takin' them.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE08.vcd" //You're too late.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE09.vcd" //I'm ready.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE10.vcd" //I'll see peace back on Earth… if I gotta murder every one of you bastards…. with my bare goddamn hands.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE11.vcd" //Awwww, horseshit.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE12.vcd" //You want me, come and get it. I'm just scars and tar anyway. But you didn't get them--did you, you sons of bitches?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE13.vcd" //Guess you can't unmake how things end up. None of it. This is all just how it is. But you never got them, did you? They're safe. So that's just fine.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE14.vcd" //I gotta admit.. this ain't how I pictured it. Good enough. Good enough.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE15.vcd" //I gotta admit.. this ain't how I pictured it. Good enough.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE16.vcd" //I had a good run. Knowing they're safe, I wouldn't have changed a thing.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE17.vcd" //I had a good run. I wouldn't have changed a thing.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE18.vcd" //That felt like no time at all.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE19.vcd" //That all you brought?
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE20.vcd" //If I'd known how many of you sonsabitches there were when we started out--guess I woulda saved the shoe leather and fought you there.
}
Rule PlayerIncapC7m3NamVet {
	criteria ConceptPlayerIncapacitated IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet ismapc7m3_port SaidC7M3BridgeLeap IsNotSaidC7M3NamVetDownFinal IsWithThree
	ApplyContext "TalkNamVet:1:2,C7M3NamVetDownFinal:1:0"
	Response PlayerIncapC7m3NamVet
}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE08.vcd" //You're too late.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE09.vcd" //I'm ready.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE10.vcd" //I'll see peace back on Earth… if I gotta murder every one of you bastards…. with my bare goddamn hands.
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE11.vcd" //Awwww, horseshit.

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3MOVIELINE15.vcd" //I gotta admit.. this ain't how I pictured it. Good enough.

}

	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3GRAVELHILL03.vcd" predelay "1,2" then Any Player.WarnMegaMobc7m201 3 1 //Goddamn it.. crows!
	scene "scenes/NamVet/C6DLC3GRAVELHILL04.vcd" predelay "1,2" then Any Player.WarnMegaMobc7m201 3 1 //Horseshit goddamn birds..

}

	criteria test1 IsNotCoughing IsNamVet IsTalk IsTalkNamVet

}
